#summary Using an array
<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />
= Introduction =
If you have an array of results that you want to display all you have to do is:

{{{
$grid->setSource(new Bvb_Grid_Source_Array($array));
}}}
_The array keys wil be the fields titles_

==Array format==
{{{
$array = array(array(1,2,3),array(4,5,6),array(7,8,9));
}}}
